description:
Riders Republic is an extreme sports multiplayer and massively multiplayer online game developed by Ubisoft Annecy and published by Ubisoft. It features cycling, motocross, skiing and wingsuit flying disciplines in a shared open world environment.

Riders Republic Gameplay

The main gameplay involves performing tricks while doing stunts and completing races and challenges across the various sports disciplines. Players can also free ride and explore the large open world map featuring natural parks and national parks inspired locations in the United States. The game features both competitive and cooperative multiplayer gameplay for up to 64 players.

Riders Republic Features

•Large Open World: The game features a large open world map representing national parks across the United States like Bryce Canyon, Yosemite Valley and Zion Canyon.

•Extreme Sports: The game focuses on 4 extreme sports disciplines - mountain biking, skiing, wingsuit flying and motocross bike riding. Each has its own progression, gear and customization options.

•Multiplayer: The game has both competitive multiplayer races and massively multiplayer events for up to 64 players. Players can also free ride and explore the map together.

•Trick System: The game features an in-depth trick system for performing stunts and grabs for each sport. Chaining tricks together earns score multipliers.

•Customization: Players can customize their gear, vehicles and characters with various cosmetic items that can be unlocked.

•Live Service: The game is intended to be a live service title with regular content updates adding new sports disciplines, events, locations and customizable items.

Overall, Riders Republic seems to focus on providing an extreme sports experience with a large vibrant open world, deep trick systems for each sport and both competitive and cooperative multiplayer gameplay for up to 64 players. The planned live service approach could keep the game fresh with regular updates of new content.
name: riders republic
